bronze:Allocate.NAME: Allocate
bronze:Allocate.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for all of your non-exhausted Status cards.

bronze:AlphaBuild.NAME: Early Access
bronze:AlphaBuild.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert random Status. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert *Beta *Build.
bronze:AlphaBuild.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL   Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert random Status. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert *Beta *Build.

bronze:Assembly.NAME: Assembly
bronze:Assembly.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL bronze:Encode all *Encodable cards discarded (in selected order). NL Exhaust.

bronze:Backtrace.NAME: Backtrace
bronze:Backtrace.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL   Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - Function Exhausts. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:BetaBuild.NAME: Beta Build
bronze:BetaBuild.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Insert random Status. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert *Full *Release.

bronze:BitShift.NAME: Bit Shift
bronze:BitShift.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Encoded card to return to your hand. It gains Retain. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:BitShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose an Encoded card to return to your hand. It gains Retain. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Boost.NAME: Boost
bronze:Boost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Strength.

bronze:Branch.NAME: Branch
bronze:Branch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage or gain !B! Block. NL The option not chosen is bronze:Encoded.

bronze:Break.NAME: Break
bronze:Break.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - Gain a *Burn, a *Wound, and a *Slimed.

bronze:BronzeArmor.NAME: Bronze Armor
bronze:BronzeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !bauto! Artifact. NL bronze:Compile *Error - ALL enemies gain !M! Block. NOTE: SHARES CARD SPACE WITH FLAIL AND IS THE WEAK LINK

bronze:BronzeOrb.NAME: Bronze Orb
bronze:BronzeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Encode a random card with *Encode in your draw pile. Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:BugBarrage.NAME: Bug Barrage
bronze:BugBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Wound. NL bronze:Cycle each Status, dealing !D! damage for each.
bronze:BugBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Wounds. NL bronze:Cycle each Status, dealing !D! damage for each.

bronze:BurnOut.NAME: Burn Out
bronze:BurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for ALL of your Status cards, then Exhaust them. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for ALL of your Status cards (

bronze:ChildClass.NAME: Invoke
bronze:ChildClass.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain [E] equal to the total cost of Encoded cards.

bronze:ChosenStrike.NAME: Cultist Strike
bronze:ChosenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Increase this card's damage by !M! permanently.

bronze:ClassDefault.NAME: Class Default
bronze:ClassDefault.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a Function, increase all numbers on it by !M!.

bronze:CleanCode.NAME: Clean Code
bronze:CleanCode.DESCRIPTION: Remove the next !M! *Compile *Errors you would *Encode. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:CleanCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Remove the next !M! *Compile *Errors you would *Encode. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:CloningBeam.NAME: Merge Conflict
bronze:CloningBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you bronze:Encode a card, bronze:Encode a copy of it. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:CloningBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you bronze:Encode a card, bronze:Encode a copy of it. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Constructor.NAME: Constructor
bronze:Constructor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.   When *Encoded as the first card, increase its Block by !M!.

bronze:CopyPaste.NAME: Copy Paste
bronze:CopyPaste.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Function is played twice.
bronze:CopyPaste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn, your next Function is played twice.

bronze:CutThrough.NAME: Cut Through
bronze:CutThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL bronze:Compile - Draw !bauto! card.

bronze:DarkDash.NAME: Dark Dash
bronze:DarkDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert a *Void.

bronze:DelayedGuard.NAME: Delayed Guard
bronze:DelayedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:DelayedSlice.NAME: Robo-Chop
bronze:DelayedSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

bronze:DigitalCarnage.NAME: Digital Carnage
bronze:DigitalCarnage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - Function is Ethereal.

bronze:FindAndReplace.NAME: Find and Replace
bronze:FindAndReplace.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your draw or discard pile. NL Add a *Dazed where it was.
bronze:FindAndReplace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your draw or discard pile. NL Place this card where it was.

bronze:FineTuning.NAME: Fine Tuning
bronze:FineTuning.DESCRIPTION: Increase all numbers on Encoded cards by !M! except cost. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:FineTuning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase all numbers on Encoded cards by !M! except cost. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Flail.NAME: Flail
bronze:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !bauto! times. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

bronze:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Through
bronze:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the last played card was a Function, play this again. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:ForceShield.NAME: Force Shield
bronze:ForceShield.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Function created this combat. NL Gain !B! Block. NL NOTE: REVISIT THIS CARD

bronze:ForLoop.NAME: For Loop
bronze:ForLoop.DESCRIPTION: The next card you bronze:Encode causes X additional copies to also be bronze:Encoded. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:ForLoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next card you bronze:Encode causes X+1 additional copies to also be bronze:Encoded. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Format.NAME: Format
bronze:Format.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Encode X copies of *Fragment. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:Format.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Encode X+1 copies of *Fragment. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
bronze:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Dexterity. NL NOTE: Revisit?

bronze:Frontload.NAME: Safeguard
bronze:Frontload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Retain.

bronze:FullRelease.NAME: Full Release
bronze:FullRelease.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Compile - Function becomes a Power with 'At the start of your turn... NL Note: Too complicated to change this quickly.'

bronze:GetLatest.NAME: Get Latest
bronze:GetLatest.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random card with bronze:Encode, it costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust. NL NOTE: Revisit later.

bronze:Goto.NAME: Goto
bronze:Goto.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL bronze:Compile - Next turn, draw !M! cards.
bronze:Goto.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL bronze:Compile - Next turn, draw !M! cards.

bronze:Hardcode.NAME: Hardcode
bronze:Hardcode.DESCRIPTION: Next time you create a Function, add it to your deck. NL Remove the cards used to create it (including this).

bronze:HardenedForm.NAME: Summon Orb
bronze:HardenedForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create or play a Function, put the rarest card from your draw or discard pile into your hand.

bronze:HyperBeam.NAME: HYPER BEAM
bronze:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put 5 *Dazed on top of your draw pile.

bronze:InfiniteBeams.NAME: Infinite Beams
bronze:InfiniteBeams.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain a *Minor *Beam.
bronze:InfiniteBeams.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain a *Minor *Beam+.

bronze:InfiniteLoop.NAME: Infinite Loop
bronze:InfiniteLoop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Gain a copy of this next turn with !M! more damage.

bronze:Iterate.NAME: Iterate
bronze:Iterate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL NOTE: Buff?

bronze:ItsAFeature.NAME: It's a Feature
bronze:ItsAFeature.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 temporary Strength and Dexterity. NL NOTE: REWORK
bronze:ItsAFeature.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 temporary Strength and Dexterity. NL NOTE: REWORK

bronze:Library.NAME: Library
bronze:Library.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a random card with bronze:Encode, it costs 0 until played.

bronze:MaxOutput.NAME: Max Output
bronze:MaxOutput.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !bauto! additional card and add a !bauto! *Dazed into your discard pile.
bronze:MaxOutput.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !bauto! additional cards and add !bauto! *Dazed into your discard pile.

bronze:Mutator.NAME: Mutator
bronze:Mutator.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL *Transform a Status into a copy of this.

bronze:NullPointer.NAME: Null Pointer
bronze:NullPointer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - Function is Unplayable. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:OilSpill.NAME: Oil Spill
bronze:OilSpill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert a *Slimed. NL NOTE: MEME CARD?

bronze:Optimize.NAME: Optimize
bronze:Optimize.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the next !M! cards you bronze:Encode that can be upgraded.

bronze:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
bronze:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove the next *Compile *Error you would *Encode.

bronze:Overload.NAME: Copy Paste
bronze:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of each Encoded card. They do not Encode. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:Overload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of each Encoded card. They do not Encode. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Philosophize.NAME: Philosophize
bronze:Philosophize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !bauto! Strength. NL bronze:Compile *Error - ALL enemies gain !M! Strength.

bronze:RecursiveStrike.NAME: Recursive Strike
bronze:RecursiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Encode !M! copies of *Strike.
bronze:RecursiveStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Encode !M! copies of *Strike+.

bronze:Refactor.NAME: Refactor
bronze:Refactor.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust all Status and Curse cards discarded. NL Gain !B! Block for each card exhausted.

bronze:Repair.NAME: Repair
bronze:Repair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - At the end of combat, heal !M! HP.

bronze:Replicate.NAME: Replicate
bronze:Replicate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.   When *Encoded, add a copy to your discard pile.

bronze:Repulsor.NAME: Repulsor
bronze:Repulsor.DESCRIPTION: When you draw the first Status or Curse card each turn, Exhaust it and draw a card. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:Repulsor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you draw the first Status or Curse card each turn, Exhaust it and draw a card. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Return.NAME: Return
bronze:Return.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Next turn, gain [E]. NL NOTE: Buff?
bronze:Return.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E]. NL NOTE: Buff?

bronze:Separator.NAME: Separator
bronze:Separator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.   When bronze:Encoded in the middle, increase its damage by !M!.

bronze:Shell.NAME: Blockchain
bronze:Shell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! bronze:Blur. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! bronze:Blur.

bronze:Shield.NAME: Sticky Shield
bronze:Shield.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Insert 1 *Slimed.

bronze:ShipIt.NAME: Ship It
bronze:ShipIt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each Status card in your Exhaust pile.

bronze:SpaghettiCode.NAME: Spaghetti Code
bronze:SpaghettiCode.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Encode random cards until you create a Function.

bronze:Terminator.NAME: Terminator
bronze:Terminator.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Compile - If this is the last card of the Function, it gains 'Play this again'.

bronze:ThunderWave.NAME: Thunder Wave
bronze:ThunderWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 guardianmod:Buffer. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:TinkerersToolbox.NAME: Dev Tools
bronze:TinkerersToolbox.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain *Debug, *Batch, *Decompile, or *Byte *Shift. NL Exhaust. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:TinkerersToolbox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain *Debug, *Batch, *Decompile, or *Byte *Shift. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Turbo.NAME: Turbo
bronze:Turbo.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Add a *Void into your discard pile. NL FREE CARD SPACE
bronze:Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile. NL FREE CARD SPACE

bronze:Undervolt.NAME: Undervolt
bronze:Undervolt.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Gain 2 Burns. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Verify.NAME: Sentient Form
bronze:Verify.DESCRIPTION: The first Function you play each turn is played twice.
bronze:Verify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! Functions you play each turn are played twice.

bronze:Virus.NAME: Virus
bronze:Virus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard your hand. NL Gain a *Minor *Beam for each card discarded.
bronze:Virus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard your hand. NL Gain a *Minor *Beam+ for each card discarded.

bronze:WildBeam.NAME: Cleanse
bronze:WildBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random Status or Curse card in your draw pile.

bronze:WildStrike.NAME: Wild Strike
bronze:WildStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert a *Wound. NL NOTE: RETURN TO LATER

bronze:Batch.NAME: Batch
bronze:Batch.DESCRIPTION: Create a Function immediately out of the cards currently Encoded. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Batch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a Function immediately out of the cards currently Encoded.

bronze:ByteShift.NAME: Byte Shift
bronze:ByteShift.DESCRIPTION: Return all Encoded cards to your hand. NL They gain Retain. NL Exhaust.
bronze:ByteShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return all Encoded cards to your hand. NL They gain Retain. NL Exhaust.

bronze:DazingPulse.NAME: Dazing Pulse
bronze:DazingPulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert !M! *Dazed.

bronze:Debug.NAME: Debug
bronze:Debug.DESCRIPTION: Remove all *Compile *Error effects from Encoded cards. NL Exhaust.

bronze:DecaBeam.NAME: Proto-Shield
bronze:DecaBeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Plated Armor and bronze:Insert !bauto! *Dazed.

bronze:Decompile.NAME: Decompile
bronze:Decompile.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Encoded cards. Gain [E] and draw a card for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Decompile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all Encoded cards. Gain [E] and draw a card for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

bronze:DonuBeam.NAME: Proto-Beam
bronze:DonuBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Strength.

bronze:Explode.NAME: Explode
bronze:Explode.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hexamod:Soulburn to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert !bauto! *Burn.

bronze:Spike.NAME: Spike
bronze:Spike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Thorns.

bronze:Ignite.NAME: Ignite
bronze:Ignite.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hexamod:Soulburn. NL At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.
bronze:Ignite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hexamod:Soulburn. NL At the end of your turn, take 4 damage.

bronze:IntoTheVoid.NAME: Into the Void
bronze:IntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL When drawn, lose 1 Energy. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Daze.NAME: Daze
bronze:Daze.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.
